page.title: 04CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Traditional games are more popular playground games than Commercially produced ones. Games of{skipping, {marbles & chasing games}are the favourites. Younger children like{Kiss {chase}where the boys chase and catch the girls and kiss them.Older children prefer{countdown,bulldog and tig},all variants of chasing and tigging by touching. Those who are tigged then become the pursuers.{Hide & seek}and {50_50 In}are similar. In the latter 4 posts are named ,the seeker counts to 50 while the others try to touch the posts unobserved. They must hide when '50_50 looking' is called & then race to the base with the task completed. {Skipping games}usually have rhymes. At the moment{'Busy Bee'}is popular. The first'skipper'names a person to be the'bee'who then gives chase around the turning rope.
